channel.title: Need help with pk point spell convertion

item.title: Need help with pk point spell convertion
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

I have this… and there information

Information(int magicIndex,int height, int stopMovementTime, int level, int ANI, int handGFX, int projectile, int endGFX, int damage, int rune1, int rune1AM, int rune2, int rune2AM, int rune3, int rune3AM, int rune4, int rune4AM) {

case 1154://water strike gatherMagicInformation(1154, 100, 0, 5, 711, 93, 94, 95, 4, 555, 1, 556, 1, 558, 1, -1, -1); break;

i’m trying to add this for it work with pk points

[code]if(spellID == 1154) //Water Strike Admin Strike Admin Spell(Admin only)
{
if(pkpoints <= 1099)
{
sendMessage(“You need 1,100 Pk-Points to cast this spell!”);
}
else if(pkpoints >= 1100)
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(60);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
inCombat();
actionTimer = 53;
stillgfx(76, castOnPlayer.absY-1, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“1,100 Players Kills Spell !”);

teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1)
{
sendMessage(“1,100 Players kills Spell !”);
}
}[/code]

Any one has an idea?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with pk point spell convertion
